data.prayer: Jesus, strengthen the church in Sangha, Republic of Congo by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Sangha, Republic of Congo
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 12,493 believers in Sangha against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.
Father, for those with enemies and who are afraid in Sangha, call them into your shelter and safety today.
data.verse: For you have been a refuge for me, a strong tower from the enemy.

data.prayer: Spirit, give the believers of the the state of Sangha unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.
Father, I pray that the Hausa people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Hausa people know you.
Father, bless the state of Sangha with a multiplying movement of house churches.
data.verse: ...but indeed, as I live, all the earth will be filled with the glory of the Lord.

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 12,493 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.section_summary:
the state of Sangha, Republic of Congo has a population of 85,700.

We estimate Sangha has 12,493 people who might know Jesus, 60,769 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 12,438 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 6 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the local leaders in Sangha, Republic of Congo to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.
